name: places/ChIJY1nSrR_3wokR_rQqbCbMADU
formattedAddress: 1453 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10027, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1453 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10027, USA

originalText.text: I ordered the oxtail Rasta pasta & for me it will be a 2/10 . Literally the oxtails taste over cooked . The Rasta pasta was not good . They put a bunch of oregano on the top which was very pointless to me . Everything was pretty much bland & the cheese was not melted . It’s like they sprinkled cheese on top & let it sit to melt . This was my first time ordering & I wouldn’t go back . Sorry for the bad review guys maybe next time it will be better for others .

originalText.text:
So i ordered some chicken and French fries on Uber eats and when it came the French fries and chicken was soggy with no seasoning.

This restaurant lied about their name on Uber Eats as “ chuck university “, I searched it up on google and it doesn’t exist. Then I looked at my receipt and it’s said the ACTUAL name of the restaurant. Not only the restaurant has awfully unseasoned soggy food but it is also deceiving people and lying about their name on Uber Eats to have a good reputation.

Warning: don’t order online from this place or dine in, you will be very disappointed. This restaurant needs to be shutdown immediately. The food is absolutely terrible and disgusting.

Don’t order from this place.

I rate it a 0/10.

originalText.text: So if you’re ever in Harlem Manhattanville and you need some real soul food there’s only one place to go and that is “Fork and Key” The collard greens are out of this world and the yams, the fried chicken, the shrimp scampi and the list goes on and on. Make your way down here and God bless you and praise Jesus

Make your way down here and God bless you and praise Jesus

originalText.text: I tried to give it a chance. The collard greens taste like liquid smoke. No flavor from neck bones, seasoning or chicken stock… just straight up liquid smoke. The chicken tastes unseasoned. I can see the pepper but all I taste is plain chicken. I ended up throwing it out. The only reason I ate as much as I did is because I was starving. P

originalText.text:
Ghost kitchen with multiple listings of the same food, except prices are different. This place is all over the place. Let's see, they have listed at 1453 Amsterdam Ave:

1. Monster Mac
2. Packed Bowls by Wiz Khalifa
3. Firebelly Wings
4. Grilled Cheese Society (they said they don't serve grilled cheese in a previous review - LOL!)
5. Mac Mac Mac - Harlem
6. Wings Wings Wings - Harlem
7. Wing SZN - Harlem
8. SnapBack Chicken Tenders and Mac - Harlem

Average rating among all of these on Uber Eats: 3.1!!!

I ordered from this place two separate times believing it to be a different place. I was quite disappointed both times. If you go out of your way to confuse customers, I'm going out of my way to give my honest feedback. Stick to one restaurant listing and at least try and focus on a specialty than cramming the freezer with all of this nonsense to reheat and sling out. This is not the way to increase your customer base.
